page.title: 09THE CHURCH
page.content: THERE ARE FIVE CHURCHES IN SHEPTON MALLET-CHURCH OF ENGLAND,ROMAN CATHOLIC,METHODIST,BAPTIST,AND SALVATION ARMY HALL. THERE HAS BEEN A CHURCH ON THE PRESANT SITE FOR AT LEAST 900 YEARS.THERE IS A SUNDAY SCHOOL AND 30 TO 40 CHILDREN GO.ABOUT 200 PEOPLE ATTEND SUNDAY SERVICES. THERE ARE ABOUT 20 GROUPS CONNECTED TO THE CHURCH. THERE ARE 4 SERVICES ON A SUNDAY. THERE IS A SPECIAL PROJECT BEING UNDERTAKEN BY THE CHURCH AT THIS MOMENT.THE MONEY IS BEING RAISED TO HELP STARVING PEOPLE IN EASTERN AFRICA. IN THE RECTORS SPARE TIME HE WRITES BOOKS,AND BREEDS BUTTERFLIES.
